mapper.select: SELECT emp_seq_no AS empSeqNo, emp_wanted_title AS empWantedTitle, emp_busi_nm AS empBusiNm, emp_wanted_stdt AS empWantedStdt, emp_wanted_endt AS empWantedEndt, emp_wanted_type_nm AS empWantedTypeNm, reg_log_img_nm AS regLogImgNm, emp_wanted_homepg_detail AS empWantedHomepgDetail FROM job_postings
